Context & Architecture¶

Additionally, include data flow diagrams.


System Context Diagram¶

The system context diagram illustrates how the service node of the system interacts with the world it is serving; a slightly complex example.


Architecture¶

The architecture, which outlines integrations with other systems, modelling stages, data flows, monitoring node, re-training node, etc.
